channel.title: CVE Feed for Citrix -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Citrix -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4966|2024-08-02T07:44:53.522Z -- citrix -- netscaler%20adc
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure in NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway when configured as a Gateway (VPN virtual server, ICA Proxy, CVPN, RDP Proxy) or AAA virtual server.

item.title: CVE-2023-3467|2024-08-02T06:55:03.548Z -- citrix -- netscaler%20adc
item.description: Privilege Escalation to root administrator (nsroot)

item.title: CVE-2023-3466|2024-08-02T06:55:03.525Z -- citrix -- netscaler%20adc
item.description: Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)

item.title: CVE-2023-3519|2024-08-02T06:55:03.597Z -- citrix -- netscaler%20adc
item.description: Unauthenticated remote code execution

item.title: CVE-2023-24488|2024-08-02T10:56:04.119Z -- citrix -- citrix%20adc%20and%20citrix%20gateway
item.description: Cross site scripting vulnerability in Citrix ADC and Citrix Gateway in allows and attacker to perform cross site scripting

item.title: CVE-2023-24491|2024-08-02T10:56:04.221Z -- citrix -- citrix%20secure%20access%20client%20for%20windows
item.description:
A vulnerability has been discovered in the Citrix Secure Access client for Windows
which, if exploited, could allow an attacker with access to an endpoint with Standard User Account that has the vulnerable client installed to escalate their local privileges to that of NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2023-24492|2024-08-02T10:56:04.227Z -- citrix -- citrix%20secure%20access%20client%20for%20ubuntu
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in the Citrix Secure Access client for Ubuntu which, if exploited, could allow an attacker to remotely execute code if a victim user opens an attacker-crafted link and accepts further prompts.

item.title: CVE-2023-24490|2024-08-02T10:56:04.280Z -- citrix -- virtual%20delivery%20agents%20for%20windows%20for%20cvad%20and%20citrix%20daas%20security
item.description: Users with only access to launch VDA applications can launch an unauthorized desktop

item.title: CVE-2023-24489|2024-08-02T10:56:04.280Z -- citrix -- citrix%20sharefile%20storage%20zones%20controller
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in the customer-managed ShareFile storage zones controller which, if exploited, could allow an unauthenticated attacker to remotely compromise the customer-managed ShareFile storage zones controller.

item.title: CVE-2023-24487|2024-08-02T10:56:04.165Z -- citrix -- citrix%20adc%20and%20citrix%20gateway
item.description: Arbitrary file read in Citrix ADC and Citrix Gateway

item.title: CVE-2023-24483|2024-08-02T10:56:04.285Z -- citrix -- citrix%20virtual%20apps%20and%20desktops
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified that, if exploited, could result in a local user elevating their privilege level to NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM on a Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops Windows VDA.

item.title: CVE-2023-24485|2024-08-02T10:56:04.241Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Vulnerabilities have been identified that, collectively, allow a standard Windows user to perform operations as SYSTEM on the computer running Citrix Workspace app.

item.title: CVE-2023-24484|2024-08-02T10:56:04.298Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: A malicious user can cause log files to be written to a directory that they do not have permission to write to.

item.title: CVE-2023-24486|2024-08-02T10:56:04.282Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20linux
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Citrix Workspace app for Linux that, if exploited, may result in a malicious local user being able to gain access to the Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops session of another user who is using the same computer from which the ICA session is launched.

item.title: CVE-2024-6286|2024-08-01T21:33:05.352Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Local Privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Citrix Workspace app for Windows

item.title: CVE-2024-6151|2024-08-01T21:33:04.965Z -- citrix -- windows%20virtual%20delivery%20agent
item.description: Local Privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Virtual Delivery Agent for Windows used by Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops and Citrix DaaS

item.title: CVE-2024-6677|2024-08-01T21:41:04.270Z -- citrix -- uberagent
item.description: Privilege escalation in uberAgent

item.title: CVE-2024-5661|2024-08-01T21:18:06.782Z -- citrix -- citrix%20hypervisor
item.description: An issue has been identified in both XenServer 8 and Citrix Hypervisor 8.2 CU1 LTSR which may allow a malicious administrator of a guest VM to cause the host to become slow and/or unresponsive.

item.title: CVE-2024-6150|2024-08-01T21:33:04.941Z -- citrix -- citrix%20provisioning
item.description: A non-admin user can cause short-term disruption in Target VM availability in Citrix Provisioning

item.title: CVE-2024-6148|2024-08-01T21:33:04.870Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20html5
item.description: Bypass of GACS Policy Configuration settings in Citrix Workspace app for HTML5

item.title: CVE-2024-6149|2024-08-01T21:33:05.091Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20html5
item.description: Redirection of users to a vulnerable URL in Citrix Workspace app for HTML5

item.title: CVE-2024-2049|2024-07-23T14:10:30.524Z -- citrix -- citrix%20sd-wan%20standard%2Fpremium%20editions
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in Citrix SD-WAN Standard/Premium Editions on or after 11.4.0 and before 11.4.4.46 allows an attacker to disclose limited information from the appliance via Access to management IP.

item.title: CVE-2024-6677|2024-07-16T18:28:17.916Z -- citrix -- uberagent
item.description: Privilege escalation in uberAgent

item.title: CVE-2024-6149|2024-07-12T15:50:18.389Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20html5
item.description: Redirection of users to a vulnerable URL in Citrix Workspace app for HTML5

item.title: CVE-2024-6148|2024-07-12T15:50:41.376Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20html5
item.description: Bypass of GACS Policy Configuration settings in Citrix Workspace app for HTML5

item.title: CVE-2024-6150|2024-07-11T14:47:00.964Z -- citrix -- citrix%20provisioning
item.description: A non-admin user can cause short-term disruption in Target VM availability in Citrix Provisioning

item.title: CVE-2024-6286|2024-07-11T03:55:34.800Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Local Privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Citrix Workspace app for Windows

item.title: CVE-2024-5661|2024-06-14T20:17:31.352Z -- citrix -- citrix%20hypervisor
item.description: An issue has been identified in both XenServer 8 and Citrix Hypervisor 8.2 CU1 LTSR which may allow a malicious administrator of a guest VM to cause the host to become slow and/or unresponsive.

item.title: CVE-2024-2049|2024-03-12T12:43:50.905Z -- citrix -- citrix%20sd-wan%20standard%2Fpremium%20editions
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in Citrix SD-WAN Standard/Premium Editions on or after 11.4.0 and before 11.4.4.46 allows an attacker to disclose limited information from the appliance via Access to management IP.

item.title: CVE-2024-5661|2024-06-13T05:58:45.694Z -- citrix -- citrix%20hypervisor
item.description: An issue has been identified in both XenServer 8 and Citrix Hypervisor 8.2 CU1 LTSR which may allow a malicious administrator of a guest VM to cause the host to become slow and/or unresponsive.
